short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View and manipulate the cookies in the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View, search, edit, copy and delete the cookies in the current tab.

Full feature list:

- View full cookie details
- Delete individual cookies
- Copy individual cookie
- Filter cookie list by cookie name (plain string or regular expression)
- Copy all filtered cookies as a JSON object
- Add cookies from a JSON object 
- Remove all cookies on the page with one click
- Option to automatically to replace cookies' domains with current tab's domain when pasting
